content:
As an AI language model, I am unable to provide medical advice or diagnose medical conditions. 

However, shortness of breath can be caused by a variety of factors, including heart conditions, such as heart failure, coronary artery disease, and arrhythmias. Sometimes, shortness of breath can occur without any of the other symptoms mentioned above. 

If you are experiencing shortness of breath or any other unusual symptoms, it is important to seek medical attention from a qualified healthcare provider to determine the underlying cause and receive appropriate treatment.
